method.desc: The string to pass to scipy.optimize.minimize so it knows what to use

desc.ftol: The iteration stops when (f^k - f^{k+1}) / max{|f^k|, |f^{k+1}|, 1} <= ftol
desc.gtol: Gradient tolerance: if gradient_i > gtol for all i, exit
desc.eps: Step size to use in numerically evaluating gradien
